PrecisRegulations Amending the OLD AGE SECURITY REGULATIONS by making them consistent with amendments to the Old Age Security Act [Bill C-23] which provide for the equal treatment of common-law partners.

precis:
Regulations Amending the OLD AGE SECURITY REGULATIONS by making them
consistent with amendments to the Old Age Security Act [Bill C-23] which
provide for the equal treatment of common-law partners.
